channel.title: Education on lavafroth
channel.description: Recent content in Education on lavafroth

item.title: Help
item.description: Hello everyone. Since it’s not obvious from the landing page of my blog, my name is Himadri Bhattacharjee. I am from India. I graduated high school in early 2022. Over the past two years, I have applied to multiple colleges including but not limited to Harvard, MIT and Stanford. I did so because I believed that my academics in school would meet the expectations of such institutions. My extra curricular activities felt good enough to complement my applications.
